name: wikihop
description: WikiHop â€” Wikirace mobile game (monorepo root)

scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/mobile -w apps/backend -w packages/shared --if-present
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w apps/mobile -w apps/backend -w packages/shared --if-present
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/mobile -w apps/backend -w packages/shared --if-present
scripts.dev: npm run db:up && npm run dev:backend
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up postgres -d
